column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////This time I was determined to get there earlier
column3: coincidentally was the same day as the Texans were playing. I think that was why the place wasn't as jam packed as the first time I visited. This time I got an almond croissant
column7: and macchiato with caramel. I also got a lemon tart
column10: and a plain baguette to-go. The lemon tart was still in my mind and I just had to have it. The shortcake was delicious! You get a little biscuit
column13: and a preserve on the bottom. I would've preferred the sticky bun to be warmed up slightly though.
